title: Hextech Crafting Yellow Essence
body:
Basically, I got, after a bit of time of playing and loving Singed, Surfer Singed skin from Hextech Crafting, and I have 6 Yellow Essence. Now, I was going to disenchant Slayer Jinx and Battlecast Ward for it, but I would end up with 669 Yellow Essence total, and I need 675 Essence. So I was wondering if you guys, Riot, could sooomehow give me 6 Yellow Essence, cause it's bugging me sooo much, and I finally got a skin for my Singed. :DD
If that's possible, or okay with you guys, of course! ^-^

replies.body:
I'm sorry, friend, but we are unable to give you essence, neither orange nor blue. :(

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Aww, oh well. I guess I will just have to grind out another 3 key fragments. Gonn' be fun. :'D :D
Anyway, thanks for responding! I was just curious, cause those 6 Essence were killing me. :'D 
But, oh well, thanks anyway! :D
(love your name, btw)
